rows.label: qst103401_msg0001
rows.name: You've come at a good time!

rows.label: qst103401_msg0002
rows.name:
A report has come in from
my subordinate who was on
an intelligence mission.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0003
rows.name:
It's about the anti-imperialists
who murdered my wife.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0004
rows.name:
The anti-imperialist organization
Brionac... That is their name.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0005
rows.name:
I've received information that Brionac
members will be gathering soon.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0006
rows.name:
The location is Mine No. 2...
right under the nose of the
Imperial Capital, Alba Margen!

rows.label: qst103401_msg0007
rows.name:
I believe I should report this
to the council and proceed with
a military sweep operation.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0008
rows.name:
But I fear they might interfere,
just as they did with my wife...

rows.label: qst103401_msg0009
rows.name:
When I think that they might
even harm my son, I hesitate...

rows.label: qst103401_msg0011
rows.name:
If you are willing to investigate,
I can focus on protecting myself.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0014
rows.name:
I've heard that a few Brionac
members will be gathering, but
please be very careful...

rows.label: qst103401_msg0101
rows.name:
The anti-imperialist organization Brionac...
Normally, I would want the military to
handle this through the council.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0102
rows.name:
But with what happened to my wife...
it's difficult for me to act.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0103
rows.name:
You are my only hope.
I'm counting on you.
